Title: Requires a quality of life hearing and preparation of environmental impact statements prior to implementing traffic modifications on certain streets
Summary: Requires a quality of life hearing and preparation of environmental impact statements prior to implementing traffic modifications on streets with residential zoning in a city having a population of more than one million people.
LawCode: Add ยง19-158.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a quality of life hearing and preparation of environmental impact statements prior to implementing traffic modifications on streets with residential zoning in a city having a population of more than one million people
